name: Catch'a Jelly
description:
"Catch'a Jelly" is a 2D endless runner in which you have to collect as many points as possible by catching the pink jellyfish and avoiding the purple jellyfish.  

Catch'a Jelly is my first officially released indie game. Later in the future, more options will be added in which you will be able to purchase outfits and backgrounds with the points gained. 

Have fun playing, 

regards your least favorite GameDev
